title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-5.1 - Internal heater installation prohibited
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 14-5.1 - Internal heater installation prohibited

State Regulations
A heater for either liquid fuels or other liquids harmful
to the boiler shall not be installed directly in the steam or water space
within a boiler. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
14-5.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
